context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: reach out to the pharmaceutical company who makes the medication

explore various options such as assistance programs offered by pharmaceutical companies, discount programs, or non-profit organizations

explore different options for financial assistance
consider speaking with the doctor to see if there are any alternative medications that might be more affordable but still effective for his wife's illness
explore different options to acquire the needed medication
contact the pharmaceutical company directly
seek financial aid or assistance

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for a tow truck and a taxi or a ride-share service like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport while his car is being taken care of

call for a taxi, Uber or any other ride-sharing service as soon as possible to ensure he reaches the airport in time
call a taxi service, Uber, or a friend to pick him up and drive him to the airport
call a taxi or an Uber to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi or a ride-hailing service like Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport as soon as possible
call a taxi, Uber, or other ride service to continue his journey to the airport
call a taxi, Uber, or another ride service to get to the airport swiftly
call for a taxi, Uber or Lyft so that he can continue his journey to the airport while the car is being taken care of

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: immediately report the missing money to his superior and explain the situation
check the surveillance cameras if any, or check the transaction records to see if there are any mistakes
immediately inform the store owner or his superior about the missing money
recount the money in the register carefully to ensure no mistakes were made in the initial counting or calculation
meticulously check the sales records, receipts, or CCTV footage (if available) to trace the missing money
contact his supervisor or boss to report the issue
contact his superior or the owner of the bakery immediately and explain the situation
double check the transactions made throughout the day to ensure no mistakes were made in giving change or recording sales
carefully review the day's transactions and receipts to possibly find a record-keeping error
report the missing money to the store owner or higher management immediately

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay in one location so that they can be found easier by the rescue crew
stay put and create a signal to attract the attention of rescuers
start rationing the remaining food and water among his group
stay put and avoid wandering off
stay in one place
stay calm and try to remain in one place if possible
find a way to conserve and ration their remaining resources while they wait for help to arrive
stay where they are in a safe and secure location, since moving around too much might cause them to miss the rescue team or get into more dangerous situations
gather the group and ration their remaining supplies, ensuring everyone has basic sustenance over the coming days
stay calm and keep everyone together, in an effort to conserve body heat and resources
